trans-unit.source: Specifies the type semantics that are used to resolve the function overloads.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來解析函式多載的型別語意。

trans-unit.source: Each store provider must use these enumeration flags in the provider manifest file for every function definition.
trans-unit.target: 每個存放區提供者必須在每個函式定義的提供者資訊清單檔中使用這些列舉旗標。

trans-unit.source: The ParameterTypeSemantics class specifies type semantics for promotability, implicit conversion, and explicit conversion for the provider primitive types.
trans-unit.target: ParameterTypeSemantics 類別指定的類型語意，提升、 隱含轉換，和提供者的基本類型的明確轉換。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] reads this information from the storage provider manifest file into the ParameterTypeSemantics class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)]從儲存體提供者資訊清單檔案讀入 ParameterTypeSemantics 類別這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: Then, [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)] uses the ParameterTypeSemantics class to determine the appropriate function definitions based on the parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 然後，[!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/add/includes/vstecado-md.md)]使用 ParameterTypeSemantics 類別來判斷適當的函式定義的參數類型為基礎。

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating the implicit conversion between the given and the formal argument types.
trans-unit.target: 表示之間的隱含轉換的旗標指定及型式引數型別。

trans-unit.source: This is the default conversion type.
A flag indicating the type promotion between the given and the formal argument types.
trans-unit.target: 表示之間的型別提升的旗標指定及型式引數型別。

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating the usage of strict equivalence only.
trans-unit.target: 表示嚴格對等的使用方式的旗標。
